definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Men, brethren, and fathers, hear ye my defence which I make now unto you.
sentences.chinese: 諸位父兄請聽，我現在對你們分訴。

sentences.english: Brothers and fathers, listen now to my defense.
sentences.chinese: 諸位父兄請聽，我現在對你們分訴。

sentences.english: Hear now my reasoning, and hearken to the pleadings of my lips.
sentences.chinese: 請你們聽我的辯論，留心聽我口中的分訴。
